cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 18th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 18th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: 10 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 10 Bed - Female only Dorm. Fully Air conditioned with unlimited WiFi access in room. Enjoy our 10 bed dorm set up with it's own large private shower and toilet. Perfect for a group or single travelers to enjoy their stay in Surfers.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 8 bed Mixed Dorm (on Ground floor). Fully Air conditioned room with unlimited WiFi access within rooms, personalized key card access. Large Spacious 8 bed dorm set up with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy their own personal space.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 bed Mixed Dorm (Large) - Fully Air conditioned and unlimited Free Wifi. Room access will be personalized with designated key card that will also access allocated lockers upon check in. Perfect for guests who enjoy more space in their 4 shared Dorm.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
